game.name: Ambulance Chauffeur Simulator 2
game.genres: Adventure, Casual, Indie, Racing, Simulation, Sports
game.shortDescription: Experience the adrenaline rush of emergency response in Ambulance Chauffeur Simulator 2.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Experience the adrenaline rush of emergency response in Ambulance Chauffeur Simulator 2.

reviewHighlights.text: [b][i]When you go to save one life, don't take another along the way.[/i] The main rule of ambulance.[/b] At first I thought it was a simple car ride...
Working in an ambulance is not an easy job. A lot of unpleasant situations await you, people will be afraid of death. Your task is to save everyone.
